Docs.summary: Get metrics for specific dimension values. Example: Metric contains dimension like SamplerName, Error. To retrieve all the time series data where SamplerName is equals to HTTPRequest1 or HTTPRequest2, the DimensionFilter value will be {"SamplerName", ["HTTPRequest1", "HTTPRequest2"}
